ISSUE.TITLE: pasta: UDP/IPv4 large transfer, tap: mismatch
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: So far debian-only, in parallel system tests ``` not ok 379 |505| UDP/IPv4 large transfer, tap in 2576ms ... $ podman logs --follow c-socat-t379-i0yzkalc f7f2c12c2da26c7fe3701753a8a3167b - #/vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv #| FAIL: Mismatch between data sent and received #| expected: = 16650cce72835ebf29698339858b4296 - #| actual: f7f2c12c2da26c7fe3701753a8a3167b - #\^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ ``` * debian-13 : sys podman debian-13 rootless host sqlite * PR #23275 * [10-02 12:37](https://api.cirrus-ci.com/v1/artifact/task/5697441880604672/html/sys-podman-debian-13-rootless-host-sqlite.log.html#t--00379p) in [sys] |505| UDP/IPv4 large transfer, tap * [10-01 17:23](https://api.cirrus-ci.com/v1/artifact/task/5176892674801664/html/sys-podman-debian-13-rootless-host-sqlite.log.html#t--00375p) in [sys] |505| UDP/IPv4 large transfer, tap | x | x | x | x | x | x | | ---: | ---: | ---: | ---: | ---: | ---: | | sys(2) | podman(2) | debian-13(2) | rootless(2) | host(2) | sqlite(2) |

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #24295 from lsm5/rpm-spec-cleanup [skip-ci] RPM: remove dup Provides

COMMIT.MESSAGE: pasta udp tests: new bytecheck helper ...for debugging #24147, because "md5sum mismatch" is not the best way to troubleshoot bytestream differences. socat is run on the container, so this requires building a new testimage (20241011). Bump to new CI VMs[1] which include it. [1] https://github.com/containers/automation_images/pull/389 Signed-off-by: Ed Santiago <santiago@redhat.com>

pasta udp tests: new bytecheck helper ...for debugging #24147, because "md5sum mismatch" is not the best way to troubleshoot bytestream differences. Because socat is run on the container, we need to build a new testimage (20241009). Signed-off-by: Ed Santiago <santiago@redhat.com>
